page.title: 04QUARRY MERCASTON
page.content: Is being worked by Amey Roadstone Corporation. Bunter Deposit-Glacial. 450,000tons p.a. extracted. 12 employees from Kirk Ireton Brails- ford & Wirksworth. Sand & gravel is conveyed from quarry by enclosed continuous belt & taken over the road to screening plant.Here it is graded into sands & gravels. Sand Zoone 2/3 goes to Charcon Products Ltd & used for block-making. Sand & gravel is used for building purposes in surrounding area. Waste product-silt. Stored as unsightly heap. This is dealt with by continuous watering & settlement in lagoons.Expected life of quarry is 20yrs. After use the area will be landscaped & rehabilit- ated.,
